attributes.action: reintroduce a sense of british dignity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have seen a decline in the standards of behaviour over recent years and i believe that this could be corrected, if we were to reintroduce such classic icons as Winston Churchill, the British Bulldog and the Ovaltinies,oh yes and let the local bobby give kids a clip round the ear and give teachers the ability to dole out respect with their trusty old cane,bring back respect.

rejection.details: lots of petitions already say things like this
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
